desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

desc.en: ハナエは配る用のプレゼントを買うべく先生と共にショッピングモールへと向かう。しかし、ハナエが選んだプレゼントは全て健康用品で、それがきっかけとなってブラックマーケットの不良たちと喧嘩になってしまう。ハナエは不良たちの横暴に怒り、彼女らを改善すべく行動に出るのだった。
desc.jp: ハナエは配る用のプレゼントを買うべく先生と共にショッピングモールへと向かう。しかし、ハナエが選んだプレゼントは全て健康用品で、それがきっかけとなってブラックマーケットの不良たちと喧嘩になってしまう。ハナエは不良たちの横暴に怒り、彼女らを改善すべく行動に出るのだった。
desc.zh_cn: ハナエは配る用のプレゼントを买うべく先生と共にショッピングモールへと向かう。しかし、ハナエが选んだプレゼントは全て健康用品で、それがきっかけとなってブラックマーケットの不良たちと喧哗になってしまう。ハナエは不良たちの横暴に怒り、彼女らを改善すべく行动に出るのだった。

hobby.jp: ダンス、チアリーディング

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

desc.en: Sensei visits Haruka, worried about her and her weeds in the cold weather. They talk about resilience and care, and Sensei buys Haruka a warm meal.
desc.jp: Sensei visits Haruka, worried about her and her weeds in the cold weather. They talk about resilience and care, and Sensei buys Haruka a warm meal.
desc.zh_cn: 基于担心{cf遥香}和草，老师来到了{cf遥香}的基地。老师买了热食给在照顾杂草的{cf遥香}。

desc.en: Sensei responds to Hasumi's call. Hasumi is struggling to do up the zipper on her tracksuit. Hasumi gives up on her zipper and tries to focus on the paperwork for the field day with Sensei instead, but Sensei is the one who ends up getting distracted by Hasumi's outfit.
desc.jp: Sensei responds to Hasumi's call. Hasumi is struggling to do up the zipper on her tracksuit. Hasumi gives up on her zipper and tries to focus on the paperwork for the field day with Sensei instead, but Sensei is the one who ends up getting distracted by Hasumi's outfit.
desc.zh_cn: 老师收到了{cf莲实}的联系。{cf莲实}努力地想要拉起体育服的拉链，但后来就放弃了，接着便认真的和老师一起准备体育祭的相关业务，但老师却因为{cf莲实}的服装难以专心工作。

desc.en: Sensei finds Kotori in the lobby, exhausted. She is suffering from dizziness and tries to explain her symptoms. Sensei begins to explain the dizziness on her behalf, and thanks to Sensei's consideration, Kotori is able to rest.
desc.jp: Sensei finds Kotori in the lobby, exhausted. She is suffering from dizziness and tries to explain her symptoms. Sensei begins to explain the dizziness on her behalf, and thanks to Sensei's consideration, Kotori is able to rest.
desc.zh_cn: 老师总觉得{cf亚都梨}看起来很疲惫，出于担心而前往等候室。{cf亚都梨}晕眩症发作之余，仍想说明症状。老师代替{cf亚都梨}继续说明晕眩症，多亏有老师的照顾，{cf亚都梨}心情愉快地好好休息了一段时间。

desc.en: Sensei finds Koyuki hunched over in the grass. Hoping to improve her luck, Koyuki is looking for a four-leaf clover. Sensei stops to help, and after a while, the two manage to find one.
desc.jp: Sensei finds Koyuki hunched over in the grass. Hoping to improve her luck, Koyuki is looking for a four-leaf clover. Sensei stops to help, and after a while, the two manage to find one.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在草地上发现了缩成一球蹲在地上的{cf小雪}。{cf小雪}在四处寻找四叶幸运草，期望运气能因此而变好。老师和{cf小雪}最后终于发现了四叶幸运草。

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.

desc.en: In order to make up for the mistakes she made in the squad, Miyu goes through sniper training with Sensei at an abandoned house on the hillside. While Sensei sets up a target, all kinds of wild animals surround Miyu, but Miyu is so focused on training that she doesn't notice. Even when her gun keeps shaking, she thinks Sensei is playing a prank on her.
desc.jp: In order to make up for the mistakes she made in the squad, Miyu goes through sniper training with Sensei at an abandoned house on the hillside. While Sensei sets up a target, all kinds of wild animals surround Miyu, but Miyu is so focused on training that she doesn't notice. Even when her gun keeps shaking, she thinks Sensei is playing a prank on her.
desc.zh_cn: {cf美优}为了挽回在小队里犯下的错误，在半山腰的废弃房屋里，和老师一起进行狙击训练。在等待老师设置好靶纸回来的期间，有很各种各样的野兽环绕在{cf美优}身边，但是集中在狙击训练上的{cf美优}，却以为是老师在跟他开玩笑而感到困扰。

hobby.jp: 否定的な妄想、現実逃避、小石探し

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 负面妄想、逃避现实、寻找卵石

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Sensei goes to the docks upon hearing about Miyu's desire to try out a new disguise. There, Sensei finds Miyu quietly fishing to avoid drawing attention to herself. However, things quickly go south after Miyu catches a very rare fish.
desc.jp: Sensei goes to the docks upon hearing about Miyu's desire to try out a new disguise. There, Sensei finds Miyu quietly fishing to avoid drawing attention to herself. However, things quickly go south after Miyu catches a very rare fish.
desc.zh_cn: 老师听说{cf美优}要测试新的伪装，于是来到码头边。为了避人耳目，{cf美优}伪装成钓客在那里钓鱼。不过{cf美优}却在无意间钓到一条大鱼，反而受到周围的热烈关注。

desc.en: Sensei goes to the dock again at Saki's behest, who excitedly shares that she found something called a lunge mine in the village warehouse. She swears that, with this, she'll finally catch a fish. However, the power of the lunge mine turns out to be much stronger than expected, and Saki accidentally demolishes the fish.
desc.jp: Sensei goes to the dock again at Saki's behest, who excitedly shares that she found something called a lunge mine in the village warehouse. She swears that, with this, she'll finally catch a fish. However, the power of the lunge mine turns out to be much stronger than expected, and Saki accidentally demolishes the fish.
desc.zh_cn: 再度收到{cf咲希}的联系后，老师前往码头。{cf咲希}在村子仓库里发现名为刺突爆雷的工具，声明这次一定要用它抓到鱼。不过刺突爆雷的威力超乎预期的强烈，会让射中的鱼支离破碎。

hobby.jp: 銃器の整備、植物などの採集

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

hobby.jp: 少女漫画、家事全般

desc.en: Umika is a student studying at Hyakkiyako, a member of the Festival Management Committee.

desc.zh_cn: 海花是一名百鬼夜行的学生，节庆营运管理部的一名成员。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

desc.en: After all the matches are over, Ako finally tracks down Hina. Hina reassures her worried friend and explains why she was missing. Hina praises Ako for solving her cases, then invites her to join them for a bonfire.
desc.jp: After all the matches are over, Ako finally tracks down Hina. Hina reassures her worried friend and explains why she was missing. Hina praises Ako for solving her cases, then invites her to join them for a bonfire.
desc.zh_cn: 所有比赛都结束后，{cf亚子}终于找到了失踪的{cf阳奈}。{cf阳奈}安抚了忧心忡忡的{cf亚子}，解释自己缺席的原因，并称赞{cf亚子}在自己不在的时候，和{sn其他}学生们合力解决了各种事件。于是，两人在一阵交谈后，也往营火晚会走去。

hobby.jp: ヒナ委員長
睡眠、休憩

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.zh_cn: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.zh_cn: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

desc.en: The expedition team defends the box only to find that there's nothing inside. Ui shares the truth that she's discovered. The box was a memorial capsule made by the students of an ancient council. Ui then says she has a request for everyone.
desc.jp: The expedition team defends the box only to find that there's nothing inside. Ui shares the truth that she's discovered. The box was a memorial capsule made by the students of an ancient council. Ui then says she has a request for everyone.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然调查团顺利守住了箱子，但里面什么都没有。{cf忧}根据目前的调查结果说出真相。箱子是古代圣徒会的学生们制作的纪念时光胶囊。接着{cf忧}向大家提出了一个请求。

name.en: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.jp: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.zh_cn: 寻找隐藏的遗产～{sn三一}的课外活动～

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.jp: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.zh_cn: 偷偷拷贝{cn修女会}的经典却被发现的{cf忧}，在{cf花子}的仲裁下（？）担负起调查遗址的任务……在{sn三一}近海的无人岛展开横冲直撞的遗迹探险记！

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.jp: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.zh_cn: 偷偷拷贝{cn修女会}的经典却被发现的{cf忧}，在{cf花子}的仲裁下（？）担负起调查遗址的任务……在{sn三一}近海的无人岛展开横冲直撞的遗迹探险记！

desc.en: On Valentine's Day, Miyu gives Sensei handmade chocolate bark, in thanks for everything they've done for her.
desc.jp: On Valentine's Day, Miyu gives Sensei handmade chocolate bark, in thanks for everything they've done for her.
desc.zh_cn: 情人节来临，为了报答老师这段期间的帮忙，{cf美优}送老师自己精心制作的手工巧克力。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
